metadata.title: Ayaz commends security forces for killing terrorists in Dera Ismail Khan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 10 (APP):Speaker of the National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Friday lauded the security forces for eliminating five khwarij terrorists during an operation in Dera Ismail Khan. Commending their efforts, he said, aThe actions of our security forces to crush the sinister ambitions of Khwarij terrorists are highly commendable.a He said that such terrorists would never succeed in achieving their malicious objectives and acknowledged the unwavering resolve and dedication of the security forces in combating terrorism. aThe entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with our security forces in the war against terrorism,aA Ayaz Sadiq affirmed, underscoring the collective determination to eradicate this menace and ensure peace and stability.
content.summary: Speaker of the National Assembly, Ayaz Sadiq, commends security forces for eliminating terrorists in Dera Ismail Khan. He praises their efforts and acknowledges the nation's support in the war against terrorism.
